intro_templates.script: Tonight, I need your company. We’re diving into the lineup for Saturday at Radio 1’s Big Weekend in Liverpool. No frills, just music. First up, Sam Fender—let’s go.

Welcome to Piano Room Chill with Joe Wiley. For the next two hours, relax with handpicked performances from legends and rising stars. Let’s begin with the beautiful 'Stay With Me' by Sam Smith and the BBC Concert Orchestra.

What’s up? What are you up to this weekend? Text me on 03700 100 100—I’ll give you a shoutout! Until then, it’s an hour of back-to-back anthems from Rudimental, DJ Fresh, and Red Light. Let’s get into it!

Big salute to the MOBOs! Best Video? Skepta – 'That’s Not Me.' From streets to the spotlight, this one's for the real ones. Only cost £80, and still changed the game. Salute to Stormzy and all the young MCs coming up!

You’re locked into Asian Network Certified Mixes with Meenakies Kanda. Kicking it off this morning with DJ Harps’ Anthem Mix. Get your shoutouts in—03459 440445. Let’s turn up the vibes and light up your morning.
